dynamite.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a powerful explosive used especially for breaking rock
dynamite.translation[0].definitions[1].d: something or someone that is likely to cause a lot of trouble
dynamite.translation[0].definitions[1].e: If the proposals became public they would be dynamite.
dynamite.translation[0].definitions[2].d: someone or something that is very exciting or impressive
dynamite.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to damage or destroy something with dynamite
